messages.message: When I try to create an account on the AI Hub EU instance, I get this error. Is this supposed to work already?

Not sure if they are any region specific configurations needed here.

cc: @Aaron Tami @Heymian

What’s the URL for this env? Want to go take a look.

cc @Yan Wang in case you’re aware of any limitations to our Google Auth only working in the US.

cc @Yash Botadra as well in case there are similar limitations with Google Drive.
https://aihub.eu.instabase.com/ (https://aihub.eu.instabase.com/)
The url is not supported. I think this is a new sandbox?
This is a parallel to aihub.instabase.com (http://aihub.instabase.com) that’s running in Europe. This is for allowing data to stay in the Europe region for folks there.
Should be good now for auth.
I think google drive should be fine as it doesn't need to specify valid callback url
oh nice, where did you have to add the URL?

In the google console, currently, we are still using the dogfood one. (https://console.cloud.google.com/apis/credentials/oauthclient/953987103077-f9flii77utafnf[…]cgq.apps.googleusercontent.com?project=instabase-dogfood (https://console.cloud.google.com/apis/credentials/oauthclient/953987103077-f9flii77utafnf4uc3aoiucaoc707cgq.apps.googleusercontent.com?project=instabase-dogfood))
ohh why is this still using the dogfood project? I thought we moved over to instabase-main?
Because at that time, we haven't get verified for main so we decide to leave the auth using dogfood and migrate it later.
I plan to migrate to main for dev and uat first and if no issue, migrate prod.
It seems we have another eu instance. I will create a list for all envs and migrate them next week.
fyi, this is the ticket for this work https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/CS-3327

That sounds good, thanks Yan.

@Timo Meijrink should be fixed now.
Ahh im sorry, it was presented yesterday and thought it was good to go...

We’ll have to do a similar thing for Google Drive support as well. @Yan Wang can you add the redirect URLs to the instabase-main app as well? (Assuming this env mirrors aihub prod. If not, we’ll have to update it so that it uses instabase-main)
I have added it to main.
fyi @Heymian I have migrate all envs of aihub to instabase-main. Thanks
Great timing. AI Hub prod was in a bad state anyway :stuck_out_tongue:
Awesome, thanks Yan
